name: Nike React Infinity Run Flyknit
Description: Nike React Infinity Run Flyknit - These are running shoes designed for comfort and stability with a Flyknit upper and React foam cushioning.

name: Nike React Miler
Description: Nike React Miler - These are running shoes designed for long-distance runs, with a React foam midsole for cushioning and a durable rubber outsole for traction.

name: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 37
Description: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 37 - These are running shoes with a Zoom Air unit in the forefoot for responsive cushioning and a lightweight mesh upper for breathability.

name: Nike Joyride Run Flyknit
Description: Nike Joyride Run Flyknit - These are running shoes designed for comfort with Joyride cushioning technology and a Flyknit upper.

name: Nike Mercurial Vapor 13 Elite FG
Description: Nike Mercurial Vapor 13 Elite FG - These are soccer cleats with a lightweight upper and a soleplate designed for speed and agility.

name: Nike Phantom Vision Elite Dynamic Fit FG
Description: Nike Phantom Vision Elite Dynamic Fit FG - These are soccer cleats with a sock-like Dynamic Fit collar and a textured upper for control.

name: Nike Phantom Venom Academy FG
Description: Nike Phantom Venom Academy FG - These are soccer cleats with a textured upper for accuracy on the ball and a versatile multi-ground soleplate.

name: Nike Mercurial Vapor 13 Elite Tech Craft FG
Description: Nike Mercurial Vapor 13 Elite Tech Craft FG - These are soccer cleats made from premium leather and designed for speed and agility on firm ground.

name: Nike Mercurial Superfly 7 Pro MDS FG
Description: Nike Mercurial Superfly 7 Pro MDS FG - These are soccer cleats with a Dynamic Fit collar and a Flyknit upper for a locked-in fit and control at high speeds.

name: Nike Air Force 1
Description: Nike Air Force 1 - These are classic basketball shoes with a leather upper and Nike Air cushioning for comfort.

name: Nike Air Max 90
Description: Nike Air Max 90 - These are iconic sneakers with a visible Air-Sole unit in the heel and a durable leather and mesh upper.

name: Nike Air Max 90 LTR
Description: These sneakers feature a leather upper with a classic design that blends modern and retro elements. The Nike Air Max technology in the sole provides cushioning and comfort.

name: Nike Joyride Dual Run
Description: These running shoes have a unique design with tiny beads in the sole that move with your feet, providing personalized cushioning and support.

name: Nike Renew Run
Description: These sneakers have a lightweight and breathable design with a foam sole that offers responsive cushioning and durability for your daily runs.

name: Bridgport Advice
Description: These casual sneakers have a clean and simple design with a leather upper and a rubber sole. They're perfect for everyday wear.

name: Beck
Description: These high-top sneakers have a canvas upper and a rubber sole with a vintage-inspired design. They're a great choice for casual wear.

name: Fester
Description: These sneakers have a minimalist design with a leather upper and a rubber sole. They're versatile enough to wear with a variety of outfits.

name: Pixel
Description: These sneakers have a futuristic design with a mesh upper and a unique sole that looks like it's made up of individual pixels.

name: Austin
Description: These sneakers have a classic design with a canvas upper and a rubber sole. They're a timeless choice for everyday wear.

name: SS-HL-0135
Description: These sleek sneakers have a leather upper and a rubber sole with a minimalist design that's perfect for dressing up or down.

name: SS-HL-0136
Description: These sneakers have a similar design to the SS-HL-0135 but with a suede upper for a different look and feel.

name: SS-HL-0128
Description: These sneakers have a textured leather upper and a chunky rubber sole with a unique design that's sure to make a statement.

name: SS-MS-0075
Description: These sneakers have a modern design with a mixed-material upper and a chunky sole. They're perfect for adding a contemporary touch to any outfit.

name: SS-PM-0093
Description: These sneakers have a unique design with a neoprene upper and a chunky sole with a futuristic look.

name: Nizza X Disney
Description: These sneakers have a fun and playful design featuring Disney characters on a canvas upper with a rubber sole.

name: X_PLR
Description: These sneakers have a modern design with a breathable mesh upper and a rubber sole that's perfect for everyday wear.

name: Stan Smith
Description: These iconic sneakers have a classic design with a leather upper and a rubber sole that's recognizable worldwide

name: NMD_R1
Description: These sneakers have a modern design with a knit upper and a Boost sole that offers responsive cushioning and support.

name: NMD_R1 Flash Red
Description: These sneakers have the same design as the NMD_R1 but with a bold flash red colorway that's sure to turn heads.

name: Superstar
Description: These classic sneakers have a leather upper and a rubber shell toe with a timeless design that's been popular for decades.

name: Club C Revenge Mens
Description: These sneakers have a clean and classic design with a leather upper and a rubber sole that's perfect for everyday wear

name: SK80-Low
Description: These sneakers have a unique design with a mixed-material upper and a chunky sole that's perfect for adding a statement piece to any outfit

name: Michael Feburary SK8-Hi
Description: These sneakers have a collaborative design between Vans and surfer Michael February with a colorful upper and a classic SK8-Hi silhouette
